description: This file is an HTML document serving as a frontend interface for visualizing and browsing databases and their tables. It includes embedded CSS styles and JavaScript functions for dynamically fetching and displaying database information, tables, and data with interactive features.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the backend API and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Handles the refresh action, reloads the database list.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands/collapses the database to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays the tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data from a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs HTML for the data table with data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Generates HTML for individual cell content, handling objects, long text, and nulls.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for details.
